text:
Hi my name is Emmy, and welcome to our Ray 
Dashboard walkthrough series. In this video,

we're going to take a closer look at the "Cluster" 
view. On my main landing page, I can see this

hierarchical relationship between my machines, 
or nodes, and the processes that run on them,

or workers. So I can expand into each node and see 
the assignment of resources to specific actors and

tasks, and we can also find quick access to the 
logs, stack traces, and flame graphs that are

associated with them. If I scroll further, 
I can get more information about CPU usage,

GPU usage, wherever it's relevant. And if I'm 
particularly sensitive to out of memory issues,

for instance, this would be a great way to find 
at a glance where your performance problems are.

That covers the key features of the Cluster 
view in Ray Dashboard. If you're curious,

for more information, watch the other videos 
in this series and thanks for watching!
